mapper.update: update partylist set party_join=true where party_id=#{party_id} and member_id=${member_id}
mapper.delete: delete from partylist where party_id=#{party_id} and member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.select: select * from partylist where #{searchKey} like #{searchWord} order by party_id desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageBlock}
select * from partylist where party_id like #{searchWord} order by party_id desc
select * from partylist where member_id like #{searchWord} order by party_id desc
select * from partylist where member_id like #{searchWord} and party_join=true order by party_id asc
select p.party_id,p.party_name,p.party_master,pl.member_id,pl.party_join from party p inner join partylist pl on p.party_id = pl.party_id where member_id=#{searchWord} limit #{startRow}, #{pageBlock}
select * from partylist where party_id=#{party_id} and member_id=#{member_id}
select count(*) total_rows from party inner join partylist on party.party_id = partylist.party_id where member_id=#{searchWord}
